problem.description: Insurance is expensive, impersonal and often complicated. It covers standard risks – but what about your special case?

solution.description1: Instead of anonymous insurance companies, we connect you with real experts. People who understand your risk because it's their field of expertise.
solution.description2: You submit your risk. Our AI analyzes it. Experts make offers. You choose the best partner.

faq.subtitle: You have questions? We have answers. Here you'll find everything important about xrisk.

whatIsXrisk.question: What is xRisk?
whatIsXrisk.answerBold: A marketplace for risks – open, transparent and human.

answer.intro: xRisk brings together people with different risk attitudes:
list: Playful ones who enjoy the thrill.
answer.content1: Every risk assumption works like a bet on probabilities – but with real value: You eliminate risk instead of speculating.
answer.content2: This creates a new market for small and large risks.

cost.question: What does xRisk cost me?
cost.answerBold: Start for free – learn about risk playfully.

answer.content1: Currently you use xRisk for free.
answer.content2: We're testing the system, training our AI agents and inviting you to be part of the first community.
answer.content3: You can even win if you actively participate!
answer.content4: In the future we will offer paid features.

riskEvaluation.question: How does xRisk evaluate my risk?
riskEvaluation.answerBold: AI makes your risk understandable – in three simple steps.

list: Our AI asks you brief follow-up questions.
The AI analyzes millions of data sources in your language.
answer.result: a fair, data-based risk assessment and suggestions for your individual risk fee.
answer.content: Fast, transparent and cheaper than any traditional analysis.

riskPartner.question: Who is my risk partner?
riskPartner.answerBold: Real people. Real companies. Real security.

answer.intro: All participants at xRisk are verified.
list: Identity verification with ID and selfie
answer.content: So you always see who you're sharing your risk with – safe and trustworthy.

claimProcess.question: What happens in case of damage?

answer.content1: You and your risk partner define in the contract when a claim occurs and how it's proven.
answer.content2: An independent service provider reviews the case neutrally.
answer.content3: If there are uncertainties, an arbitration procedure ensures a quick and fair decision.

answer.content1: xRisk operates under supervision of BaFin (Germany) and FINMA (Switzerland).
answer.content2: Payments are processed via Stripe – one of the safest global payment services.
list: Risk fee: paid by the risk giver
Benefit amount: reserved on the risk taker's card
answer.content3: This way all payments are doubly protected.

testimonials.question: What do others say about xRisk?

answer.quote: "When I come to the website, I immediately understand what it's about. The case examples make you want to try xRisk. Very convincing!"

footer.headline: This is insurance as it should be.

description.paragraph1: Insurance used to be a necessary evil. We reinvented it: individual instead of collective, intelligent instead of bureaucratic.
description.paragraph2: At xrisk, you're not covered by an anonymous corporation, but by a specific expert – a workshop for your car, a craftsman for your home. People who really understand your risk.
description.paragraph3: Our AI evaluates your individual risk fairly and transparently. Your risk partner earns when nothing happens – and solves the problem immediately if something does.
